characters.name: Marvin Grossberg
characters.description1: My superior and the head of Grossberg Law Offices.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: My client. A third year art student at Ivy University. He currently has a cold.

characters.name: Doug Swallow
characters.description1: The victim. He was a fourth year Pharmacology student at Ivy University.

characters.name: Dahlia Hawthorne
characters.description1: Phoenix Wright's girlfriend. Dated the victim Doug Swallow up until eight months ago.

characters.name: Winston Payne
characters.description1: The prosecutor for this trial. A veteran lawyer with a little too much confidence.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: Me. What more can I say? This is my third year as a young (but skilled!) lawyer.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.

characters.name: Adrian Andrews
characters.description1: Head of planning, promotion, and security of the Treasures of Kurain Exhibit.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Mask☆DeMasque
characters.description1: A flashy thief who steals valuable works of art. Sends a calling card before a heist.

characters.name: Luke Atmey
characters.description1: An Ace Detective. Has great powers of deduction, yet rarely makes sense.
characters.description2: An Ace Detective. Has acknowledged that he is in fact Mask☆DeMasque.

characters.name: Ron DeLite
characters.description1: A young man who turned himself in as Mask☆DeMasque. A bit of a pitiful guy.
characters.description2: Claims he is Mask☆DeMasque. Used to work as a guard for KB Security.

characters.name: Desirée DeLite
characters.description1: Ron DeLite's wife. Seems to be a very friendly and out-going lady.
characters.description2: Ron DeLite's wife. Hates criminals and cowards more than anything.

characters.name: Larry Butz
characters.description1: My friend. I've known this trouble magnet ever since grade school.
characters.description2: My friend. Picked up Ron DeLite's wallet while working on the night of the crime.

characters.name: Godot
characters.description1: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.

characters.name: Kane Bullard
characters.description1: CEO of KB Security. His body was found inside his safe.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.

characters.name: Godot
characters.description1: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Maggey Byrde
characters.description1: A waitress at Trés Bien. Was found guilty of murder thanks to the phony me.

characters.name: Jean Armstrong
characters.description1: Trés Bien's owner and chef. A witness in the case who is also into aromatherapy.
characters.description2: Trés Bien's owner and chef. Has a long debt and prior convictions for theft.

characters.name: Glen Elg
characters.description1: The victim. Was a programmer. Maggey had apparently never even seen him before.
characters.description2: The victim. Was a programmer. His left eardrum was broken the day before the incident.
characters.description3: The victim. Was a programmer. Wore an HMD over left eye. Left eardrum was ruptured.

characters.name: Victor Kudo
characters.description1: Was in Trés Bien at the time of the incident. Has a thing for waitresses.
characters.description2: Was in Trés Bien at the time of the incident. Called the police by pay phone.

characters.name: Lisa Basil
characters.description1: The CEO of Blue Screens, Inc., and Glen Elg's boss. Absolutely not a robot.

characters.name: Violetta → Viola Cadaverini
characters.description1: Possibly part of the staff at Tender Lender? A thoroughly bitter person.
characters.description2: The granddaughter of crime boss Bruto Cadaverini. A thoroughly bitter person.

characters.name: Furio Tigre
characters.description1: The head of Tender Lender loan company. Also known as "The Tiger".

characters.name: Bruto Cadaverini
characters.description1: The head of the Cadaverini Family crime syndicate. Seems to live for his granddaughter.

characters.name: Terry Fawles
characters.description1: My client. Sentenced to death 5 years ago. Escaped from custody 2 days ago.

characters.name: Valerie Hawthorne
characters.description1: Police officer and the victim. The key witness in the case against Fawles 5 years ago.

characters.name: Diego Armando
characters.description1: A hot-shot lawyer. My senior and rival at the office. A bit smug.

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: Dubbed a genius as soon as he started as a prosecutor. Today is his court debut.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective in charge of the initial investigation. Still new to his position.

characters.name: Melissa Foster
characters.description1: A college student. Witnessed and photographed the incident on Dusky Bridge.

characters.name: Dahlia Hawthorne
characters.description1: Valerie's younger sister. Victim of the kidnap/murder at Dusky Bridge 5 years ago.
characters.description2: Valerie's younger sis. Victim of the kidnap/murder. Fell from bridge, no body found.

characters.name: Maya Fey
characters.description1: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.
characters.description2: Went to the Inner Temple for spiritual training and is now trapped there.
characters.description3: Went to the Inner Temple on the night of the incident and is now missing.
characters.description4: My assistant and a disciple in the Kurain Tradition of spirit channeling.

characters.name: Mia Fey
characters.description1: Maya's older sister and my eternal mentor in life and law. Passed away 2 years ago.

characters.name: Godot
characters.description1: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.
characters.description2: The prosecutor for this case. He apparently holds some sort of grudge against Wright.* (when play switches to Edgeworth)
characters.description3: A prosecutor who is shrouded in mystery. He seems to know me somehow.* (when play returns to Wright)

characters.name: Pearl Fey
characters.description1: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.
characters.description2: Maya's cousin. Was apparently with the victim at the time of the crime. Currently missing.* (when play switches to Edgeworth)
characters.description3: Maya's cousin, and channeling prodigy. She has amazingly powerful spiritual abilities.* (when play returns to Wright)
characters.description4: Maya's cousin and channeling prodigy. She was found at the Inner Temple.

characters.name: Bikini
characters.description1: A hearty, motherly nun at Hazakura Temple, a channeling dojo deep in the mountains.
characters.description2: A nun at Hazakura Temple, a channeling dojo. She discovered the murder.
characters.description3: A nun from Hazakura Temple. Discovered the murder. Her bad back really bothers her.

characters.name: Elise Deauxnim
characters.description1: Kind-eyed author and illustrator of picture books. Pearls is huge fan of hers.
characters.description2: The victim of this incident. A picture book author of unknown age. Larry's teacher.
characters.description3: Real name: Misty Fey. Maya's mother and Master of the Kurain Channeling Technique.

characters.name: Iris
characters.description1: A nun at Hazakura Temple. She reminds me so much of "her"...
characters.description2: The defendant. A nun from Hazakura Temple. I know I've seen her somewhere before.
characters.description3: The defendant. A nun from Hazakura Temple. Doesn't seem to have any spiritual power.

characters.name: Laurice Deauxnim* (when playing as Wright) → Larry Butz* (when playing as Edgeworth)
characters.description1: Better known as Larry Butz. Current in training as Elise Deauxnim's pupil.
characters.description2: My friend since grade school. I don't remember how we became friends, though.* (when play switches to Edgeworth)
characters.description3: Better known as Larry Butz. Current in training as Elise Deauxnim's pupil.* (when play returns to Wright)
characters.description4: AKA Larry Butz. Saw an unbelievable sight at Heavenly Hall the night of the crime.

characters.name: Phoenix Wright
characters.description1: My friend since grade school. Fell from Dusky Bridge and is currently hospitalized.

characters.name: Dick Gumshoe
characters.description1: Homicide detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.

characters.name: Franziska von Karma
characters.description1: My mentor, Manfred von Karma's, daughter. Born/raised in Germany. Prosecutor at 13.
characters.description2: Legendary prosecutor Manfred von Karma's daughter. Became a prosecutor in Germany at 13.* (when play returns to Wright)

characters.name: Miles Edgeworth
characters.description1: An old friend. Said to be #1 at the D.A.'s office. Studies foreign judicial systems now.

characters.name: Morgan Fey
characters.description1: Older sister of Misty Fey and mother of Pearl and Iris. Is in solitary confinement.

characters.name: ?????? → Dahlia Hawthorne
characters.description1: Morgan Fey's daughter and Iris's twin sister. Her father deals in jewelry apparently.
characters.description2: Morgan Fey's daughter and Iris's twin sister. She was executed last month.
